TO BE CONTINUED

...if the doujin sells well. Author has stated on her social media that based on reception to this doujin, she has plans for a second and/or a third part of this story. I’m surprised this doujin ended so suddenly on a cliffhanger like that, without any afternote from the author to address things. But she’s very communicative on social media so I expect updates about future sequels there. This doujin was announced in June 2020 and set to release in September 2020, but ended up releasing in July 2021, so I don’t expect any possible future sequels until this winter or next year. Still a visual masterpiece and a decent story (will MC get his comeuppance in the end or live happily ever after with Yukino?)

English Summary Pt6:
MC’s command surprisingly has no effect on Yukino and this time conversely Yukino forces herself on MC. MC says he’s run out and begs for a break but Yukino keeps going. Yukino makes MC finish then keeps going until it starts to feel good for him. Yukino says all she can think about lately is having sex with MC and seems focused only on MC pleasuring her. She continues to force MC to finish inside her all night and MC notices that rather than calming down her sexual desire, Yukino seems to be satisfying herself (physically) in order to “fill the gaping hole in her heart”. MC finally returns home exhausted and wonders why the ring didn’t work this time. He wonders what will happen if things continue as they are and suddenly feels a pounding feeling around his finger where the ring is. Yukino appears behind him suddenly and after MC sees her there is a snapping sound and MC shouts as the doujin fades to black.

English Summary Pt5:
Yukino mastrubates as usual but notices that she’s been doing it more and her sex drive has been increasing. MC arrives and uses the ring to make Yukino treat him as her partner / view them as lovers. He brings her favorite cream puffs, then asks her if she wants anything else. She says she wants to kiss, and MC is excited from Yukino’s new assertiveness. They continue to have sex until Yukino appears to fall asleep so MC goes to take a shower. He’s happy that he was treated like a lover but worries about what will happen if the ring’s power runs out. Yukino suddenly appears and wants to continue having sex. MC notices that the ring is in a strange condition and worries about using it, but he ends up commanding Yukino to go to sleep.

English Summary Pt4:
MC later finds his father’s diary. He finds out that on the apartment building’s land there used to be a shrine which enshrined the ring, but the shrine was destroyed when the apartment complex was built. There is a record that the ring was entrusted to a different shrine so MC doesn’t understand how it ended up with him. MC says he feels mysteriously good when wearing the ring and feels no desire to take it off. He also has sudden strong sexual impulses, and he finds himself back at Yukino’s place and continues to have sex with her. MC feels a little bad because this wasn’t exactly the kind of relationship he wanted in the beginning.

English Summary Pt3:
MC continues to question Yukino and realizes the ring’s power. Against his better judgment he decides to try his luck and uses the ring to have (raw) sex with Yukino. He finishes inside her and decides that he and only he will support her, and then he does it a few more times. The next day, MC sees Yukino looking sad in front of a bakery because her favorite cream puffs are sold out. MC notes that she doesn’t appear to remember the events of the previous day (the time while the ring was in use). MC tries to apologize and Yukino says if he treats her to the cream puffs she might forgive him.

English Summary Pt2: 
Later MC finds a strange package (left behind in his room by his father) with an ominous ring inside. The box has writing that says for any monsters / Yokai within the field of vision of the ring, if the wearer wishes / prays for it, they can charm, make suggestions and manipulate them. There is more writing but MC cannot read it due to rust.. With good intentions and wanting to help her, MC goes to see Yukino again and asks her to sign a rent assistance form. When she tries to decline, MC uses the ring on her and she obeys his command. He asks her what she does normally and she says she always masturbates by herself because Yuki Onna that don’t bear children will continue to increase their sex drives.

English Summary Pt1:
Doujin is set in a world where humans and monsters have come to co-exist. MC’s (Takahashi) father was in charge of managing an apartment complex for monsters (Yokai). MC inherits it after father passes away and meets resident Yukino Mifuyu (her name’s kanji mean snow & deep winter). Yukino is a “Snow Woman” (Yuki Onna) folk monster and has the power to chill and make things cold. MC finds out her husband passed away 2 years ago. Those who marry Yuki Onna have bad luck and die early which lead to many of them to hide their true nature. One day MC goes to Yukino’s apartment to talk to her about her missing rent payment. She says she doesn’t want to leave because there are many memories of her husband there. When MC tells her to move on rather than remember the past, Yukino gets angry and starts avoiding him.
